channel.title: 2 on Abraham P. Vinod
channel.description: Recent content in 2 on Abraham P. Vinod

item.title: Scalable Underapproximation for Stochastic Reach-Avoid Problem for High-Dimensional LTI Systems using Fourier Transforms
item.description: This paper tackles the terminal hitting-time stochastic reach-avoid problem. It proposes: Sufficient conditions under which such a controller exists An oracle that computes an open-loop optimal controller that achieves an (optimized) lower bound — the open-loop underapproximation — on the maximum stochastic reach-avoid probability

item.title: A Deterministic Attitude Estimation Using a Single Vector Information and Rate Gyros
